original_text: When she saw that she was stedfastly minded to go with her, then she left speaking unto her.
korean_text: 나오미가 룻이 자기와 함께 가기로 굳게 결심함을 보고 그에게 말하기를 그치니라

sentences.original_text: that she was stedfastly minded to go with her
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀가 그녀와 함께 가기로 굳게 마음 먹었음을

sentences.original_text: then she left speaking unto her
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그녀는 그녀에게 말하는 것을 멈추었다
